Lunch with Me

Have Lunch with Me!

in the Tampa Bay area with Ryan

Hi there! I am excited to having lunch with you! In an effort of spreading belonging, I'd like to invite you to have lunch with me.

Why have lunch with me at Airbnb?

The food is delicious and crafted with care and love by our food team

Visit Airbnb's beautiful office, learn about the company's history, people and mission

Making new friends (I will try to group 2-3 people per visit)

A little about me

Getting invited for lunch

I'd love to make your experience and my experience really magical. Every week, I will extend an invite to 2-3 individuals to have lunch the following Tuesday or Wednesday. In order to make that happen, I need to collect some information about you (name, email, LinkedIn) to match everyone accordingly and arrange for a lunch visit.
